item.title: DFT for Surface Segregation of Disordered FCC CuPdPt Alloys
item.description:
John R. Kitchin, Kirby Broderick, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4393587488
Data are split into train (<=35-atom slabs) and test (60-atom slabs) folders. Each folder contains a VASP calculation without the POTCAR. The slabs used are disordered AgAuCu, AuCuPd, or CuPdPt fcc alloys with a lattice constant set randomly between the largest and smallest experimental lattice constants of the constituent elements. The PBEsol functional is used with D3 dispersion corrections.
item.author: John R. Kitchin, Kirby Broderick

item.title: WhereWulff: A semi-autonomous workflow for systematic catalyst surface reactivity under reaction conditions
item.description:
Rohan Yuri Sanspeur, Javier Heras‐Domingo, John R. Kitchin, Zachary W. Ulissi, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2023. https://openalex.org/W4393572051
This repository houses electronic structure data and metadata generated as part of a computational chemistry case study, enabling full analysis of the paper "WhereWulff: A semi-autonomous workflow for systematic catalyst surface reactivity under reaction conditions" by Rohan Yuri Sanspeur, Javier Heras-Domingo, John R. Kitchin and Zachary Ulissi.
item.author: Rohan Yuri Sanspeur, Javier Heras‐Domingo, John R. Kitchin, Zachary W. Ulissi

item.title: Data and Code: Origin of the Stokes-Einstein Deviation in Liquid Al-Si
item.description:
Ni Zhan, John R. Kitchin, Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research). None(None)] 2021. https://openalex.org/W4393659833
The repository contains the data and code used in our work on "Origin of the Stokes-Einstein Deviation in Liquid Al-Si".
item.author: Ni Zhan, John R. Kitchin
